extension.name: Roo Code
extension.description: A whole dev team of AI agents in your editor.

confirmation.reset_state: Are you sure you want to reset all state and secret storage in the extension? This cannot be undone.
confirmation.delete_config_profile: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration profile?
confirmation.delete_custom_mode: Are you sure you want to delete this custom mode?
confirmation.delete_message: What would you like to delete?

errors.checkpoint_timeout: Timed out when attempting to restore checkpoint.
errors.no_workspace: Please open a project folder first
errors.list_api_config: Failed to get list api configuration
errors.hmr_not_running: Local development server is not running, HMR will not work. Please run 'npm run dev' before launching the extension to enable HMR.
errors.retrieve_current_mode: Error: failed to retrieve current mode from state.
errors.failed_delete_repo: Failed to delete associated shadow repository or branch: {{error}}
errors.custom_storage_path_unusable: Custom storage path "{{path}}" is unusable, will use default path
errors.mistake_limit_guidance: This may indicate a failure in the model's thought process or inability to use a tool properly, which can be mitigated with some user guidance (e.g. "Try breaking down the task into smaller steps").
errors.violated_organization_allowlist: Failed to run task: the current profile violates your organization settings
errors.condense_not_enough_messages: Not enough messages to condense context
errors.condensed_recently: Context was condensed recently; skipping this attempt
errors.condense_handler_invalid: API handler for condensing context is invalid
errors.condense_context_grew: Context size increased during condensing; skipping this attempt
errors.share_task_failed: Failed to share task. Please try again.

warnings.missing_task_files: This task's files are missing. Would you like to remove it from the task list?

info.clipboard_copy: System prompt successfully copied to clipboard
info.history_cleanup: Cleaned up {{count}} task(s) with missing files from history.
info.default_storage_path: Reverted to using default storage path
info.image_copied_to_clipboard: Image data URI copied to clipboard

tasks.canceled: Task error: It was stopped and canceled by the user.
tasks.deleted: Task failure: It was stopped and deleted by the user.

storage.prompt_custom_path: Enter custom conversation history storage path, leave empty to use default location
storage.enter_absolute_path: Please enter an absolute path (e.g. D:\RooCodeStorage or /home/user/storage)
